Webinar Paying Claims Electronically: Lessons from the Field
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.LastName},
Are you looking for ways that can turn a payment expense into a revenue generator, while improving the claims process? Claims magazine and Wright Express will host a free webinar exploring how property/casualty insurers can use electronic-payment methods for greater control and quicker turnaround of claims. The webinar is set for 2 p.m. EDT, Wednesday, May 23.
During the webinar, you will learn:
* How newer, faster, cheaper electronic claims payment options are driving financial savings in claims operations * How electronic claims payments can help improve customer satisfaction * Best practices and implementation considerations for electronic claims payments in your operation
Panelists include:
-- Jim Pratt, Vice President, Wright Express
-- David Baker, Claims Manager, Mercury Select Management Co. Inc.
The event is presented by Wright Express. For more information and to register at no charge, visit: http://www.propertycasualty360.com/webseminars/paying-claims-electronically-lessons-from-the-fiel
Sincerely, {!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} Cell - {!User.MobilePhone} {!User.Email}
www.wrightexpress.com/claims
